implementation.parameter: You were about to walk down the stairs when someone or something held you back, whispering 'Beware the giant spider, for you are too weak!'

entity.attribute: FISHING SPOTS IN FAIUMONI The best spot to fish for cod is in Ados, as this species lives in the sea. Trout live in rivers. There is an excellent fishing spot near Fado. Perch reside in rivers and lakes, too. Brave fishermen tell of big catches in the area where the elves dwell. Mackerel can only be fished at the open sea. More exotic fish are found on the island Athor. In a mountain lake near Ados is a spot where char fish are very easy to find. In Semos there is a lake which is rich in roaches.

entity.attribute: The rules and statutes of Marriage and Divorce throughout the island of Faiumoni are complex and require much ...
So Billy and Betty were very tired at the end of their long day, and they went to sleep dreaming of castles and drawbridges.
The next day Billy and Betty's mother said they must stay indoors and help her wash sheets, they were very disappointed not to be able to visit the castle again.
